The Christian souldier. Or, Preparation for battaile. A legend containing true rules for a souldier, in whom at once is met religion and resolution. Published by a well-willer to the gown and sword, T.J. Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?
[2], 6 p.
Printed for Edward Christopher, London : 1642.
Anonymously published by Thomas Jordan -- Cf. Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug: 24". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
